page.title: 05NW.SHERBORNE:THE PARISHES
page.content: This area contains parts of seven different parishes: Sherborne, Castletown (the outer parts of Sherborne), Nether Compton, Trent, Sandford Orcas, Poyntington and Oborne. All except the two Sherborne parishes forming part of a single benefice known as the{Queen Thorne} Parish. There is a sixth parish in the Queen Thorne group at Over Compton, but it lies outside the area being covered. There is one full-time priest in charge. For{civil administration}the parishes are grouped into the following Councils: Trent, Nether and Over Compton and Sandford Orcas form Queen Thorne Parish; Oborne and Poyntington are part of Yeo Head Parish; and Sherborne has its own Town Council. All form part of West Dorset District, the next level of local government.
